pages.text: With a bunch of Spider Eggs surrounding a piece of raw meat allows you to create a Spider Nest. The Nest holds smaller and more harmless spiders that will periodically generate Cobwebs around itself if there's no Blocks around it and within a dark enough area.

The Nest also has a special property. Right-clicking on it, or using a hopper, with meat will cause it to produce a loyal $(l:summons/spider_servants)Spider Servant$(). Depending on its surroundings, much like $(l:rituals/dark_altar)Altars$(), the servant can spawn as a different variant from a regular spider.

pages.title: Cave Spider Servants
pages.text: Requirements: $(li)Nest is located in a Mineshaft $(br)$(l)OR$()$() $(li)8 Podzol $(li)8 Mushrooms of any type $(li)8 Stone

pages.title: Bone Spider Servants
pages.text: Requirements: $(li)Nest is located in a Crypt $(br)$(l)OR$()$() $(li)16 Bone Blocks $(li)4 Skull Piles
